rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0001
rows.name: These ruins are impressive.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0002
rows.name:
Indeed... this architectural style
doesn't exist in Superbia...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0003
rows.name:
Luxuria has tons of ruins too,
but nothing on this scale.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0004
rows.name:
Must be something special
about the Divine Beasts in this area.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0005
rows.name:
By the way,
how is this place constructed?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0006
rows.name: I explained before, did I not?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0007
rows.name: Probably wasn't listening.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0008
rows.name:
Wasn't that before
Zeke joined our group?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0009
rows.name: Hmm... Was it? I can't recall.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0010
rows.name:
In that case,
I'll explain it once more.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0011
rows.name:
The Liberalitan Archipelago consists of
a mountainous Cloud Sea formation and
 Divine Beasts gathered like islands.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0012
rows.name:
The small Divine Beasts circle
around the large Divine Beast.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0013
rows.name:
And that larger Divine Beast
is located at the heart
of the Cloud Sea mountains.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0014
rows.name:
So... this place with these massive
ruins is actually inside that large
Divine Beast?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0015
rows.name: Indeed, that's correct.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0016
rows.name: Wow, it's in an amazing place.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0017
rows.name:
Still,
I wonder how they built these ruins?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0018
rows.name:
I mean, I doubt they carried all this
rock through the Village Guardian...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0019
rows.name:
Wasn't it built before
this large Divine Beast
entered the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0020
rows.name:
I see.
So it was initially the same
as normal Divine Beasts.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0021
rows.name:
Then at some point those cloud
mountains formed around it, creating
the Archipelago we know today.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0022
rows.name:
Yes, that would explain how
construction was possible.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0023
rows.name:
But in the current era,
building such massive ruins
would be difficult.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0024
rows.name: Indeed...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0025
rows.name:
There is neither labor force
nor new land.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0026
rows.name:
I don't think Superbia, Invidia,
or Luxuria could construct
something like this anymore.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0027
rows.name: ...Saika.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0028
rows.name:
When I die,
you don't need to make it
this magnificent.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0029
rows.name:
It would be troublesome
to be entrusted with that
when we're one body and soul.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0030
rows.name:
But for someone like you,
Prince, a snowman would be more fitting
than a grave marker!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0031
rows.name:
Where am I being buried,
Teos Aure Rear Gate?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0032
rows.name:
Well, I wouldn't
mind that, actually.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0033
rows.name: You're actually fine with that...?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0034
rows.name:
So now that we've settled
my burial arrangements...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0035
rows.name: Who should I ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0036
rows.name: Where would your grave be, Rex?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0037
rows.name: Where would your grave be, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0101
rows.name: My grave?!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0102
rows.name:
I've never really
considered that before.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0103
rows.name: Well, you are still young, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0104
rows.name: Are you saying I'm an old man!?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0105
rows.name:
I guess the first thing
that comes to mind is being buried
with my parents in Iyasaki Village.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0106
rows.name:
How about right here
in Elpys Spirit Cave?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0107
rows.name: Uh... that's kind of...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0108
rows.name:
Yeah, this place is so isolated
you'd die of loneliness.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0109
rows.name: I'd already be dead by then!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0110
rows.name:
I think I'd want to be near everyone
I care about. Though it's hard to think
about now, so I'm not entirely sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0111
rows.name: Well, that's a Rex-like answer.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0201
rows.name:
My burial arrangements have
already been determined.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0202
rows.name:
There is a tradition passed down
through generations in
the Superbian Empire...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0203
rows.name:
No need to continue.
That's exactly the answer I expected.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0205
rows.name:
Ask me again, then.
This time I'll give you
a more original answer.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0206
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, you don't need to
force yourself to be stubborn.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0207
rows.name: You know me - I can't stand losing.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0208
rows.name: Alright then, here goes...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0209
rows.name: Where will your grave be, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0210
rows.name:
A snowman at the reangate
of Teos Aure!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0212
rows.name:
Could it be that you're marrying
into the Luxuria royal family?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0213
rows.name:
Wha...?! Of course I will not!
I was just imitating
Zeke's amusing remark...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0214
rows.name:
Maybe I should have gone with
a grave in Iyasaki Village instead!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0215
rows.name: Whaaa?!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0216
rows.name: Well, that's also not quite right...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0217
rows.name: Ugh!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0218
rows.name:
Hahaha! Meleph still has a lot
to learn when it comes to humor!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0219
rows.name:
Really, the young ones
have it good, being so carefree
even in a place like this.
